channel.title: Nightfall(and completion of Emerging EP) - DJC [Ambient, Future Bass]
channel.description:
Hey all, Just finished an ambient-ish + future bass track called Nightfall! This also completes a four-track EP titled Emerging! If you could check out both Nightfall and other EP tracks that'd mean so much! Nightfall: [https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/nightfall](https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/nightfall)
EP: [https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/sets/emerging-ep](https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/sets/emerging-ep)
